personal_info.summary: Over 20 years of international experience managing multibillion-dollar infrastructure projects across North America and Europe. Expertise in P3, Design-Build, CMAR, and collaborative delivery models. Proven track record in reducing costs, optimizing project outcomes, and leading high-performing teams. Seeking executive opportunities to drive business growth and operational excellence within a dynamic construction firm.

core_competencies: P3, DB, CMAR, PDB and Alliance delivery models

responsibilities: Directing the commercial management of the $2.7B Susquehanna River Rail Bridge CMAR Project, ensuring alignment with stakeholder objectives and regulatory compliance
Managing all commercial activities including contracts, scheduling, procurement, project controls, communications, DBE participation, and financial management
Fostering strong client relationships through transparent communication and stakeholder engagement
Excelled in both capture and delivery of major projects, enhancing proposal quality and securing new business
Contributed to enhancing proposals for the $2.3B I-10 Calcasieu River Bridge P3 and $4.6B SR-400 Express Lanes P3 Project
Facilitated stakeholder meetings to ensure transparency and maintain strong client relationships
Managed projects valued up to $1B, leading cross-functional teams of up to 50 professionals
Led bid teams for projects such as EHTH Alliance, Scarborough SE PDB, and Ontario Line - EGS PDB, demonstrating ability to drive project success through strategic partnerships
Secured over $600 million in new business, contributing to a 14% increase in annual revenue
Implemented effective project management practices, boosting efficiency and productivity
Built and maintained robust relationships with clients and stakeholders
Delivered all design packages for the TXDOT | $950M Design-Build Grand Parkway Segments H, I-1, and I-2 Project six months ahead of schedule, saving over $1M in engineering costs
Managed over 300 design change modifications, enhancing project safety and cost-effectiveness
Provided leadership and strategic direction as Construction Technical Office Manager, supporting the US management team
Collaborated closely with joint venture partners, ensuring adherence to the Design-Build contract with TxDOT
Oversaw the INDOT | $400M P3 I-69 Section 5 project covering 21 miles of interstate
Managed project controls, including scope, budget, scheduling, vendor management, and technical documentation
Collaborated with vendors and project teams, preparing business and technical documentation, and generating monthly reports
Led project and risk management reviews, coordinating with construction and contractors' engineering teams
Managed and led design and supervision teams for construction, tunneling, geotechnical, and structural engineering projects with a portfolio of €1B
Oversaw the design of large-scale infrastructure projects featuring over 14 km of tunnels and 5 km of bridges on high-speed rail and highways
Expanded the company's scope to include bridge projects, improving design rates by 20%
Mentored, coached, and trained over 20 new engineers
Directed construction projects including design improvement, budgeting, planning, subcontracting, procurement, quality control, safety compliance, and environmental management
Managed the construction of the High-Speed Rail from Legutiano to Escoriatza project, a joint venture with a budget of €60M
Oversaw the Gernika Sewer improvements project with a budget of €11M
Managed the construction of the High-Speed Rail Cornellà del Terri to Vilademuls project, with an €80M budget, involving tunnels and pre-stressed concrete bridges
Oversaw design improvement, budgeting, planning, subcontracting, procurement, quality control, safety compliance, and environmental management
Supervised the construction of the Urumea highway from Martutene to Astigarraga project, a 6 km highway project with a budget of €67M
Managed supervision for the 8 km Toll Road AP1 from Eibar to Bergara with a budget of €79M
